subject: Is it possible to write tests that delete ONLY the data they create?
msgSnippet: I d like to be able to run some tests against fully populated QA databases. I can t find the right combination of set-up and tear-down to erase ALL the data
messageBody:
I'd like to be able to run some tests against fully populated QA databases. I can't find the right combination of set-up and tear-down to erase ALL the data created and inserted in the course of the test but not delete other data that preexists in the Db. 


Can this be done?
